meanings.definition: A person who works in a puddling furnace to convert pig iron into wrought iron.
meanings.sent1: The puddlers toil in the hot furnace to transform iron.
meanings.sent2: The skilled puddlers efficiently turn pig iron into wrought iron.
meanings.sent3: The puddlers joked about turning pig iron into gold in the furnace.
meanings.sent4: In the fiery furnace, the puddlers wielded their magic on the iron.
meanings.sent5: The clang of hammers echoed as the puddlers shaped the iron with precision.

meanings.definition: A group of workers who puddle iron.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated puddlers worked together to puddle the iron.
meanings.sent2: The puddlers collaborated seamlessly to puddle the iron effectively.
meanings.sent3: During lunch break, the puddlers formed a band using iron tools as instruments.
meanings.sent4: The puddlers moved in unison, like a well-oiled machine, to puddle the iron.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of puddlers at work filled the factory with energy.
